channel.title: Blogging on Alex Shook
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on Alex Shook

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
My first code blog was built on Octopress 2. It was a great starter blog, but I’ve been wanting to make some changes for a while. I got tired of waiting for Octopress 3, so I’m relaunching with Hugo, which looks like it has an active community and some great documentation.

I had planned on migrating my posts, but decided on a fresh start instead.

Hello, world.
